Title: Fort Night
Director: Boo Hwan Lim, Kyoung Hee Lim, Bernard Derriman
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Mike Olsen, Steven Davis (executive story editor), Kelvin Yu (executive story editor), Lizzie Molyneux (executive story editor), Wendy Molyneux (executive story editor), Holly Schlesinger (executive story editor)

Plot: Tricks and treats and lunatics abound.
